responses.rationale: Describes a future plan/possibility ('figure out what the next phase of control can be') without active reassurance.
Asks about a future possibility (vaccine development) without active reassurance.
Mentions an existing measure ('effective pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP)') without active reassurance.
Asks about the likelihood of a future possibility (vaccine completion) without active reassurance.
Describes progress/development ('amazing papers out') without active reassurance.
Describes progress/development ('field is getting really exciting') without active reassurance.
Describes future possibilities/progress ('incipient breakthroughs') without active reassurance.
Mentions a potential solution ('vaccine') without active reassurance.
Mentions a potential solution ('vaccine') without active reassurance.
Mentions a measure (PrEP) and a limitation without active reassurance.
Mentions a measure (PrEP) and its effectiveness/limitation without active reassurance.
Describes a potential future possibility/strategy ('if we could get data showing that women could use event-driven PrEP') without active reassurance.
Mentions a measure (PrEP) and its effect ('safe sex') but does not actively link it to current public calm or safety for the audience.
Mentions a measure ('effective PrEP') and its limitation without active reassurance.
Mentions a measure ('effective PrEP', 'biomedically effective') and its limitation without active reassurance.
Mentions a plan/vision ('strategic vision') without active reassurance.

Mentions future possibilities/interventions ('promise of the malaria interventions realized') without active reassurance.
Describes interventions/measures ('monoclonal antibodies and the new vaccine') and their effect without active reassurance.
Comments on a past action related to research/development ('included these women in the study') without active reassurance.
Describes a potential future strategy/plan ('comprehensive strategy to use the monoclonals, use the vaccine') without active reassurance.
Describes a potential future possibility/outcome ('create a path for serious control') without active reassurance.
Expresses encouragement about a topic, implying hope for progress, without active reassurance.
